title: The only way to find true peace, acceptance, and power is through stillness. Being in stillness leads...

attachments.displayName:
The only way to find true peace, acceptance, and power is through stillness. Being in stillness leads one to truth, although we may not always like to see or hear the truth. We are not living from our authentic selves, from our truth. We are asleep to who and what we really are and can be. We are disconnected from our core.
As we think and act , so our world becomes.
Affirmations change the thoughts but not the thinker. Diets change the eating patterns but not the eater. Willpower holds the negative actions in check for a little while but does not ultimately change the doer. If you only change what you do, all you get are temporary alterations to your actions.
Shift your inner viewpoint though, and your world transforms.

object.content:
The only way to find true peace, acceptance, and power is through stillness. Being in stillness leads one to truth, although we may not always like to see or hear the truth. We are not living from our authentic selves, from our truth. We are asleep to who and what we really are and can be. We are disconnected from our core.
As we think and act , so our world becomes.
Affirmations change the thoughts but not the thinker. Diets change the eating patterns but not the eater. Willpower holds the negative actions in check for a little while but does not ultimately change the doer. If you only change what you do, all you get are temporary alterations to your actions.
Shift your inner viewpoint though, and your world transforms.
